requirements.description: Test the search functionality with a valid keyword.
steps: Enter a valid keyword in the 'Meklējamais vārds vai frāze' field.
requirements.expected_result: Search results related to 'auto' are displayed.

requirements.description: Test the search functionality with an empty keyword.
steps: Leave the 'Meklējamais vārds vai frāze' field empty.
requirements.expected_result: An error message is displayed or no search results are shown.

requirements.description: Test the search functionality with special characters.
steps: Enter special characters in the 'Meklējamais vārds vai frāze' field.
requirements.expected_result: An error message is displayed or no relevant search results are shown.

requirements.scenario: Search with a specific category selected
requirements.description: Test the search functionality with a specific category selected.
steps: Select a category from the 'Sadaļa' dropdown.
requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the 'Transports' category are displayed.

requirements.description: Test the search functionality with an invalid category.
steps: Manipulate the DOM to add an invalid option to the 'Sadaļa' dropdown or use browser developer tools.
Select the invalid category and click the 'Meklēt' button.
requirements.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the category is not recognized.

requirements.scenario: Search with a specific transaction type
requirements.description: Test the search functionality with a specific transaction type selected.
steps: Select a transaction type from the 'Darījuma veids' dropdown.
requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the 'Pārdod' transaction type are displayed.

requirements.description: Test the search functionality with a specific region selected.
steps: Select a region from the 'Pilsēta, rajons' dropdown.
requirements.expected_result: Search results related to the 'Rīga' region are displayed.

requirements.description: Test the search functionality with a specific period selected.
steps: Select a period from the 'Meklēt par periodu' dropdown.
requirements.expected_result: Search results from the last week are displayed.
